FuncDef: This command is used to configure therefresh-timeandhold-timeintervals that are used for liveness detection of the RPKI-Router session. Therefresh-timedefaults to 300 seconds and is reset whenever a Reset Query PDU or Serial Query PDU is sent to the cache server. When the timer expires, a new Serial Query PDU is sent with the last known serial number.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a time in seconds. Values-30 to 32767.
Specifies a time in seconds. Values-60 to 65535.
